sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( PKCL_CORP_CODE ,PKCL_COME_CODE ,PKCL_TABL_ID ,PKCL_COLM_ID ,PKCL_SORT_NUMB ,PKCL_COLM_NAME ,PKCL_DATA_TYPE ,PKCL_DATA_LENG ,PKCL_COLM_ALGN ,PKCL_WITH_SCRN ,PKCL_DISP_ALLW ,PKCL_UPDT_DATE ,PKCL_UPDT_CMAN ,PKCL_INIT_DATE ,PKCL_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_CORP_CODE', 1, '법인코드', 'VARCHAR', '4', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_STND_GUBN', 2, '표준구분', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '40', 'Y', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_STND_DEGR', 3, '개정차수 ', 'VARCHAR', '10', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_SEQ0', 4, 'SEQ', 'NUMBER', '5', 'R', '60', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_SHAP_GRP2', 5, '제품형상분류2', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_OUT0_MIN0', 6, '압출외경 MIN', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_OUT0_MAX0', 7, '압출외경 MAX', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_NET0_MIN0', 8, 'NET길이 MIN', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_NET0_MAX0', 9, 'NET길이 MAX', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_NET0_CYTM', 10, 'NET CT', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_INIT_CUTT', 11, '초기절단시간', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_STRI_CNT0', 12, '가닥수', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_CUTT_TIME', 13, '1회재단시간', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_INIT_LENG', 14, '직HOSE길이', 'NUMBER', '10,2', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_APPL_GUBN', 15, '적용여부', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '40', 'Y', '20171214', 'SYSTEM', '20171214', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_REMK', 16, 'REMARK', 'VARCHAR', '200', 'L', '200', 'Y', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_UPDT_CMAN', 17, '수정자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_UPDT_DATE', 18, '수정일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_INIT_CMAN', 19, '등록자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'HOSE', 'CATBHOSB', 'HOSB_INIT_DATE', 20, '등록일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240505 00:24:03', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CREATED_YN ,CASE WHEN C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END COMMENTS_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE >= A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE > D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_COLM_ALGN != D.PKCL_COLM_ALGN THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_WITH_SCRN != D.PKCL_WITH_SCRN THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND C.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBPKCL D ON D.PKCL_CORP_CODE = A.PKCL_CORP_CODE AND D.PKCL_COME_CODE = A.PKCL_COME_CODE AND D.PKCL_TABL_ID = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND D.PKCL_COLM_ID = A.PKCL_COLM_ID ORDER BY A.PKCL_SORT_NUMB

CREATE TABLE CATBHOSB ( HOSB_CORP_CODE VARCHAR2(4) ,HOSB_STND_GUBN CHAR(1) ,HOSB_STND_DEGR VARCHAR2(10) ,HOSB_SEQ0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,HOSB_SHAP_GRP2 VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSB_OUT0_MIN0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSB_OUT0_MAX0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSB_NET0_MIN0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSB_NET0_MAX0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSB_NET0_CYTM NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSB_INIT_CUTT NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSB_STRI_CNT0 NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSB_CUTT_TIME NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSB_INIT_LENG NUMBER(10, 2) ,HOSB_APPL_GUBN CHAR(1) ,HOSB_REMK VARCHAR2(200) ,HOSB_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSB_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSB_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR2(8) ,HOSB_INIT_DATE VARCHAR2(8) ,CONSTRAINT CATBHOSB_PK PRIMARY KEY(
) )
WITH T1 (C1, C2) AS ( SELECT 'CORP_CODE','법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'COME_CODE','공법' FROM DUAL ) SELECT * FROM T1
